Ecosystem

Kepler

Kepler is the engine used to create your game. Itâ€™s the software you run on your computer to help build your ideas and bring them to life.

  • Kepler Website ->

Galileo

Galileo is a cluster of servers that allow players of games made in Kepler to play along side and against each other.

  • Galileo Website ->

Hubble

Hubble is a CI/CD system that lets you make sure your players always have the latest updates and the most robust, bugfree version of your game.

  • Hubble Website ->
